00016 // Init2d method --------------------------------------------------------------+
00017 bool CGLFont::Init2d(HDC hdcContext, FontMode fm, HFONT hFont, GLuint iWidth, GLuint iHeigth, GLuint iTexture) {
00018         if (m_FontMode!= fmNone) return false;
00019         
00020         HFONT hFontOld;
00021         BOOL bRet = TRUE;
00022         float fCx, fCy;
00023         
00024         // size of characters... in 2d mode should be fixed size
00025         m_fSize[0][0] = (float)iWidth;
00026         m_fSize[0][1] = (float)iHeigth;
00027 
00028         // build appropriate font:
00029         m_FontMode = fm;
00030         switch ( m_FontMode ) {
00031         case fmBitmap: {
00032                         m_iList = glGenLists(256);
00033 
00034                         hFontOld = (HFONT)SelectObject(hdcContext, hFont);
00035                         bRet = wglUseFontBitmaps(hdcContext, 0, 255, m_iList);
00036                         SelectObject(hdcContext, hFontOld);
00037 
00038                         DeleteObject(hFont);
00039                         break;
00040                 }
00041         case fmTexture: {
00042                         m_iList = glGenLists(256);                                                              
00043 
00044                         m_iTexture = iTexture;
00045                         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00046                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, m_iTexture);                       
00047         
00048                         // create 256 textured flat quads:
00049                         for (GLuint i = 0; i < 256; ++i) {
00050                                 fCx = (float)(i%16)/16.0f;                                              // X Position Of Current Character
00051                                 fCy = (float)(i/16)/16.0f;                                              // Y Position Of Current Character
00052 
00053                                 glNewList(m_iList + i, GL_COMPILE);
00054                                         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00055                                                 glTexCoord2f(fCx, 1-fCy-0.0625f);
00056                                                 glVertex2i(0, iWidth);
00057                                                 glTexCoord2f(fCx + 0.0625f, 1 - fCy - 0.0625f);
00058                                                 glVertex2i(iWidth, iWidth);
00059                                                 glTexCoord2f(fCx + 0.0625f, 1 - fCy);
00060                                                 glVertex2i(iWidth, 0);
00061                                                 glTexCoord2f(fCx, 1 - fCy);
00062                                                 glVertex2i(0, 0);
00063                                 glEnd();
00064                                 glTranslated(10, 0, 0);
00065                         glEndList();
00066                         }
00067                         break;
00068                 }
00069         case fm3d:      break;                     // one must call Init3d!
00070         default: m_FontMode = fmNone;
00071         }
00072 
00073         // any errors?
00074         if (bRet == FALSE)      {
00075                 glDeleteLists(m_iList, 256);
00076                 return false;
00077         }
00078 
00079         return true;     // success!
00080 }
00081 
00082 // Init3d method --------------------------------------------------------------+
00083 bool CGLFont::Init3d(HDC hdcContext, HFONT hFont, float fDeviation, float fExtrusion, int iFormat) {
00084         if (m_FontMode != fmNone) return false;
00085         
00086         HFONT hFontOld;
00087         GLYPHMETRICSFLOAT gmf[256];
00088         BOOL bRet;
00089 
00090         m_FontMode = fm3d;
00091 
00092         m_iList = glGenLists(256);
00093 
00094         // select font and create 3d characters:
00095         hFontOld = (HFONT)SelectObject(hdcContext, hFont);
00096         bRet = wglUseFontOutlines(hdcContext, 0, 255, m_iList, fDeviation, 
00097                                       fExtrusion, iFormat, gmf);
00098         SelectObject(hdcContext, hFontOld);
00099 
00100         DeleteObject(hFont);
00101 
00102     // ok?
00103         if (bRet == FALSE) {
00104                 glDeleteLists(m_iList, 256);
00105                 return false;
00106         }
00107 
00108         // copy sizes of the characters:
00109         for (int i = 0; i < 256; ++i) {
00110                 m_fSize[i][0] = gmf[i].gmfCellIncX;
00111                 m_fSize[i][1] = gmf[i].gmfCellIncY;
00112         }
00113 
00114         return true;
00115 }
00116 
00117 // TextWidth method -----------------------------------------------------------+
00118 float CGLFont::TextWidth(const char *strText) {
00119         // has font fixed size?
00120         if (m_FontMode != fm3d)
00121                 return (float)strlen(strText)*m_fSize[0][0];
00122 
00123         // 3d font has variant width for each character 
00124         float fLen = 0.0f;
00125         GLuint iLen = (GLuint)strlen(strText);
00126         for (GLuint i = 0; i < iLen; ++i)
00127                 fLen += m_fSize[i][0];
00128 
00129         return fLen;
00130 }
00131 
00132 // Delete method --------------------------------------------------------------+
00133 void CGLFont::Delete() {
00134         glDeleteLists(m_iList, 256);
00135         if (m_FontMode = fmTexture) glDeleteTextures(1, &m_iTexture);
00136 
00137         m_FontMode = fmNone;
00138 }

00140 // Create2dCourierFont static method ------------------------------------------+
00141 bool CGLFont::Create2dCourierFont(const CGLApp *glApp, CGLFont &glFont, GLuint iWidth, GLuint iHeight) {
00142         HFONT hFont = CreateFont(iWidth, iHeight,               // heigth and width
00143                                                          0, 0,                                  // Escapement and Orientation
00144                                                          FW_BOLD,                               // font weigth
00145                                                          FALSE, FALSE, FALSE,   // italic, underline, strikeout
00146                                                          ANSI_CHARSET,                  
00147                                                          OUT_TT_PRECIS,                 // TrueType fonts
00148                                                          CLIP_DEFAULT_PRECIS,   // clipping
00149                                                          ANTIALIASED_QUALITY,   // quality
00150                                                          FIXED_PITCH,                   // pitch
00151                                                          "Courier New");
00152 
00153 
00154         if (glFont.Init2d(const_cast<CGLApp *>(glApp)->GetHdc(), fmBitmap, hFont, iWidth, iHeight) == false)
00155                 return false;
00156         else
00157                 return true;
00158 }

00160 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00161 |                                glBeginText                                                           |
00162 +------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00163 | Disables lighting, texture 2d, depth tests... etc...                         |
00164 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00165 void glBeginText(int iScrW, int iScrH) {        
00166         glPushAttrib(GL_ENABLE_BIT);
00167         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00168         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00169         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00170         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_GEN_S);
00171         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_GEN_T);
00172         
00173         // change projection matrix
00174         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00175         glPushMatrix();
00176         glLoadIdentity();
00177         glOrtho(0.0f, (float)iScrW, (float)iScrH, 0.0f, -1.0f, 1.0f);
00178 
00179         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00180         glPushMatrix();
00181         glLoadIdentity();
00182 }
00183 
00184 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00185 |                                  glEndText                                                           |
00186 +------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00187 | Restores parameters that were before text drawing...                         |
00188 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00189 void glEndText() {
00190         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00191         glPopMatrix();
00192         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00193         glPopMatrix();
00194 
00195         glPopAttrib();
00196 }
00197 
00198 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00199 |                                 glTextout                                    |
00200 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00201 void glTextout(const CGLFont *font, const char *strText, float x, float y) {
00202         GLuint b = font->m_iList;
00203         
00204         glPushMatrix();
00205         glRasterPos2i((int)x, (int)y);
00206         
00207         glTranslatef(x, y, 0.0f);
00208 
00209         if (font->m_FontMode == fmTexture) { 
00210                 glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00211                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, font->m_iTexture); b-=32;
00212                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00213                 glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE);
00214         }
00215 
00216         glPushAttrib(GL_LIST_BIT);
00217         glListBase(b);
00218         glCallLists((GLsizei)strlen(strText), GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, strText);
00219         glPopAttrib();
00220         glPopMatrix();
00221 }

00223 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00224 |                               glTextPrintf                                   |
00225 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00226 void glTextPrintf(const CGLFont *font, float x, float y, const char *msg, ...) {
00227         char            text[256];                              // Holds Our String
00228         va_list         ap;
00229 
00230         if (msg == NULL) return;
00231 
00232         va_start(ap, msg);                                      // Parses The String For Variables
00233             vsprintf_s(text, msg, ap);          // And Converts Symbols To Actual Numbers
00234         va_end(ap);
00235 
00236         glTextout(font, text, x, y);
00237 }
